casebody.data:
STATE
v.
David FELTON. No. 186P10-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 5, 2015. David Felton, Swan Quarter, for Felton, David. Zachary Padget, Associate Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Roger A. Echols, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of September 2015 by Defendant for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed Ex Mero Motu by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of November 2015."
